column4: hey guys, i have a question related to CLI :) Euhm, once ive been trying out a GNU/Hurd LiveCD as i remember, and there in command line by default was enabled an option, that in the command line, when i typed a command and typed it wrong, there was given a suggestion for a similar command. And once, when i installed DSL on one old pc, and joined to irc with a cli irc client that was by default in ids, there was a function that gave me a suggesti
on of a complete command when i've typed a part of a command. How could i enable this in Ubuntu. thx :P
i dunno, but if you find out..please let me know >.>
